org.directwebremoting.proxy.scriptaculous
Class Effect

java.lang.Object
  org.directwebremoting.proxy.ScriptProxy
      org.directwebremoting.proxy.scriptaculous.Effect

public class Effect
extends ScriptProxy

A server side proxy the the Scriptaculous Effect class

Author:
Joe Walker [joe at getahead dot ltd dot uk], Mitch Gorman

Constructor Detail

Effect

public Effect()
Http thread constructor, that affects no browsers. Calls to ScriptProxy.addScriptSession(ScriptSession) or to ScriptProxy.addScriptSessions(Collection) will be needed

Effect

public Effect(ScriptSession scriptSession)
Http thread constructor that alters a single browser

Parameters:
scriptSession - The browser to alter

Effect

public Effect(java.util.Collection scriptSessions)
Http thread constructor that alters a number of browsers

Parameters:
scriptSessions - A collection of ScriptSessions that we should act on.
